events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and I would like to request a refund immediately as this has caused me inconvenience.
The case has been categorized under Refund due to the customer's request for money back regarding a wrong item received.
The case has been assigned to Agent Sarah who will handle the refund process for the customer.
Hello! This is Sarah from customer support. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request for the incorrect item you received.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received and your order number so I can process your refund as quickly as possible?
Thank you for getting back to me. I have attached the photos of the wrong item and my order number is 487216.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method within 3 to 5 business days.
I appreciate the quick response and your help in resolving this issue. Looking forward to receiving the refund soon.
The refund process has been completed on our end. You should see the amount credited back to your account shortly.
Just following up to confirm that you have received your refund successfully and to see if you need any further assistance.
Yes, I have received the refund. Thank you again for your prompt help and professionalism.
We are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting us, and please reach out if you need anything else in the future.
A satisfaction survey has been sent to the customer to gather feedback on their support experience with the refund process.
